name: cheftastic-buffetblast
description:
Become a Chef and fight your way through the island to uncover the secrets hidden within. Smash crates, gather collectibles and solve puzzles while battling hordes of mutant vegetables. Take on the challenge and fight unique bosses each bringing a different style to tackle. Immerse yourself in our lush world full of vibrant locations and vivid colours.

PB exploreuniquelands

Take your adventure through a multitude of different environments, each with their own surprises and unique playstyle possibilities! Fresh, but familiar gameplay will keep you glued to your seat as you slice carrots through the plains of Veggie Fields and dice toxic onions over the ice caps of Cryo-Point. Discover all the secrets, complete the puzzles, and solve the mystery that awaits!
